'''Ebor''' was the chief henchman of [[Manthor]], later appointed by him as the Captain of the Guards at the [[Ford of Brithiach]].<ref>{{WJ|Hurin}}, p. 267</ref>
Ebor revered his lord, and followed his example in spite of [[Hardang]]'s command, as when he returned gear and weapons to [[Asgon]]'s company.<ref>{{WJ|Hurin}}, p. 264</ref>
